title: Imre Reiner
content:
Type designer, wood engraver, painter and sculptor

(1900-1987)

Reiner was introduced to type design by [Ernst Scheidler](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ernst%20Scheidler). He left Germany in 1923 to come to the United States with the goal of selling a series of [sans serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/sans%20serif) faces, which had not yet gained popularity.

**Work History**  
 [Klingspor](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor)  
 [Bauer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bauer)  
 [Stephenson Blake](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephenson%20Blake)  
 [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype)

**Fonts Designed:**  
 [Meridian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Meridian) (1927)  
 [Corvinus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Corvinus) (1929)  
 [Gotika](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotika) (1932)  
 [Floride](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Floride) (1939)  
 [Matura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matura) (1939) : Designed for [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype)  
 [Sinfonia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sinfonia)/ [Stradivarius](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stradivarius) (1945)  
 [Reiner Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Reiner%20Script) (1951)  
 [Reiner Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Reiner%20Black) (1955)  
 [Bazaar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bazaar) (1956)  
 [Mercurius](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mercurius) (1957) : Designed for [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype)  
 [London Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20Script) (1957) : Designed for [Stephenson Blake](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephenson%20Blake)  
 [Pepita](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pepita) (1959) : Based on Reiner's own handwriting. Designed for [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype).  
 [Contact](http://web.archive.org/web/20140709210149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Contact) (1968)
author: Jared Benson
